law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VI, sec. 616, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1985 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 40, effective October 18, 1985.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Termination of boards, commissions, councils and committees.
